utilities

Class LPSGeneratingSetUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • utilities.LPSGeneratingSetUtility

  • public class LPSGeneratingSetUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    This class consists of a single static method, getLPSGenerators(short p, short q), which creates a List<PGL2_PrimeField> of size p+1 whose elements constitute a very special generating subset of PGL2(F_q) (or the subgroup PSL2(F_q), depending on whether or not p is a square mod q). Namely, they are the generating sets that define the so-called "Ramanujan graphs," which were introduced in the paper [LPS] as Cayley graphs with respect to these generating sets. This method appeals to the static method:

        java.util.List<int[][]> lps.LPSGenSetRepsBuilder.getGeneratorReps(int p, int q),

    for the construction of the generating set as a list of 2x2 int arrays, and then simply wraps the arrays as PGL2_PrimeField objects.

    Note that the returned List will typically contain repeated elements when p ≥ q2/4.

    References:

        [DSV] G. Davidoff, P. Sarnak, A. Valette, " Elementary Number Theory, Group Theory, and Ramanujan Graphs," Cambridge, LMSST 55, 2003.

        [LPS] A. Lubotzky, R. Phillips, P Sarnak, "Ramanujan Graphs," Combinatorica, 1986.

    Author:
    pdokos

    • Method Detail

      • getLPSGenerators

        public static java.util.List<PGL2_PrimeField> getLPSGenerators(int p,
                                               short q)
        This method produces a List<PGL2_PrimeField> of size p+1 containing the LPS generators for the group PGL2(F_q) (or the subgroup PSL2(F_q), depending on whether or not p is a square mod q).

        Note that the returned List will typically contain repeated elements when p ≥ q2/4.

        Parameters:
        p - An int prime.
        q - A short integer prime different from p.
        Returns:
        A List<PGL2_PrimeField> of size p+1 containing the LPS generators for the group PGL2(F_q) (or the subgroup PSL2(F_q), depending on whether or not p is a square mod q).

      • getPGL2ByteFieldGenerators

        public static java.util.List<PGL2ByteField> getPGL2ByteFieldGenerators(int p,
                                                       finitefields.ByteField f_q)
        This method produces a List<PGL2_PrimeField> of size p+1 containing the LPS generators for the group PGL2(F_q) (or the subgroup PSL2(F_q), depending on whether or not p is a square mod q).

        Note that the returned List will typically contain repeated elements when p ≥ q2/4.

        Parameters:
        p - An int prime.
        q - A short integer prime different from p.
        Returns:
        A List<PGL2_PrimeField> of size p+1 containing the LPS generators for the group PGL2(F_q) (or the subgroup PSL2(F_q), depending on whether or not p is a square mod q).
